'''1.19.52.0''' is the fifth and final beta version of [[Minecraft Education 1.19.52]], released only for ChromeOS on March 15, 2023, which fixes a bug.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230315140927/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log|title=Minecraft Education Change Log|website=Minecraft Education Support}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a "crash on exit" bug for Chromebooks.</onlyinclude>
